name: ReportDescribeResult

methods.name: getReportExtendedMetadata
methods.description: Returns additional information about grouping and summaries.

methods.name: getReportMetadata
methods.description: Returns unique identifiers for groupings and summaries.

methods.name: getReportTypeMetadata
methods.description: Returns the fields in each section of a report type, plus filtering information for those fields.

description: Contains report, report type, and extended metadata for a tabular, summary, or matrix report.
